snippet: The verdict is the first time a jury has decided such a case since the Supreme Court ruled last year that so-called pay-for-delay settlements may run afoul of antitrust laws.
lead_paragraph: The verdict is the first time a jury has decided such a case since the Supreme Court ruled last year that so-called pay-for-delay settlements may run afoul of antitrust laws.

headline.main: AstraZeneca and Ranbaxy Win in Antitrust Trial
headline.print_headline: Astrazeneca And Ranbaxy Win In Antitrust Trial
